title: Software Engineer
description: Tech Japan Co., Ltd. is seeking a talented Software Engineer to join our team in Tokyo. The ideal candidate will have experience in full-stack development and a passion for innovation.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
3+ years of experience in software development
Proficiency in Java, JavaScript, and SQL
Strong problem-solving skills

title: English Teacher
description: Global Language Institute is hiring English teachers to join our team in Osaka. This position involves teaching English to students of various ages and proficiency levels.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Education or related field
TEFL/TESOL certification preferred
Native-level English proficiency
Excellent communication skills

title: Marketing Specialist
description: Tokyo Marketing Agency is looking for a Marketing Specialist to develop and execute marketing campaigns for our clients. The ideal candidate will have experience in digital marketing and a creative mindset.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Marketing or related field
2+ years of experience in marketing
Proficiency in social media management tools
Strong analytical skills

title: Graphic Designer
description: Creative Design Studio is seeking a talented Graphic Designer to join our team in Kyoto. The successful candidate will be responsible for creating visually stunning designs for print and digital media.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design or related field
Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite
Experience in UX/UI design preferred
Strong attention to detail

title: Finance Manager
description: Tokyo Financial Group is hiring a Finance Manager to oversee financial planning and analysis for our company. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in finance and leadership experience.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, or related field
5+ years of experience in financial management
CPA or CFA certification preferred
Excellent decision-making skills

title: Sales Representative
description: Japan Tech Solutions is seeking a dynamic Sales Representative to drive sales growth in the Nagoya region. The successful candidate will be responsible for identifying new business opportunities and building client relationships.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field
3+ years of experience in sales
Proven track record of meeting sales targets
Excellent negotiation skills

title: UX/UI Designer
description: Digital Innovation Lab is seeking a talented UX/UI Designer to join our team in Tokyo. The ideal candidate will have a strong portfolio showcasing user-centered design solutions.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Design, HCI, or related field
3+ years of experience in UX/UI design
Proficiency in Adobe XD, Sketch, or Figma
Excellent communication skills

title: English-Japanese Translator
description: Global Communications Agency is hiring English-Japanese translators for remote positions. This role involves translating documents, emails, and other materials from English to Japanese and vice versa.
requirements: Fluent in English and Japanese
Experience in translation or interpretation
Strong attention to detail
Ability to meet deadlines

title: Hospitality Manager
description: Luxury Hotel Group is seeking a Hospitality Manager to oversee guest services and operations at our boutique hotel in Kyoto. The ideal candidate will have experience in luxury hospitality and a passion for delivering exceptional guest experiences.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Hospitality Management or related field
5+ years of experience in hotel management
Strong leadership and interpersonal skills
Fluency in Japanese and English

title: Data Analyst
description: Tech Solutions Japan is hiring a Data Analyst to analyze large datasets and provide insights to support business decision-making. The successful candidate will have strong analytical skills and experience with data visualization tools.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Statistics, Mathematics, or related field
2+ years of experience in data analysis
Proficiency in SQL, Python, or R
Experience with data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau)

title: English Content Writer
description: Online Education Platform is seeking English content writers for remote positions. This role involves creating engaging and informative content for English learners.
requirements: Native-level English proficiency
Strong writing and editing skills
Experience in content creation or copywriting
Passion for education and language learning

title: Software Developer (Remote)
description: Virtual Reality Startup is looking for a skilled Software Developer to work remotely. The ideal candidate will have experience in VR development and a passion for creating immersive experiences.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
3+ years of experience in software development
Proficiency in C#, Unity, and VR development tools
Creative problem-solving skills
